question:
Users from the alta-south.com tenant need access to SupplierPortal hosted in the alta-north.com subscription. The solution must support governed access with approval workflows.

Review the **Organization Structure** exhibit to understand the environment details.

exhibits.title: Organization Structure
exhibits.content:
### Division & Tenant Mapping

![Division Table](assets/images/division_tenant_table.svg)

| Division | Azure Subscription | Microsoft Entra ID Tenant |
| :--- | :--- | :--- |
| North | Sub-North | alta-north.com |
| South | Sub-South | alta-south.com |

options.text: Configure Microsoft Entra ID joined devices for South division users
Enable pass-through authentication in the alta-south.com tenant
Use Microsoft Entra ID Governance entitlement management
Configure Privileged Identity Management (PIM) for alta-south.com users

explanation:
The correct answer is **Use Microsoft Entra ID Governance entitlement management**.

Entitlement management enables you to define access packages with approval workflows for external users. This provides governed, auditable access to applications for users in other Microsoft Entra ID tenants.

- Device join is for managing devices, not application access for external users.
- Pass-through authentication is for authenticating on-premises AD users, not cross-tenant access.
- PIM manages privileged role assignments within an organization, not external user access.
